original_text: Soon afterward he went to a town called Nain, and his disciples and a great crowd went with him.
korean_text: 그 후에 예수께서 나인이란 성으로 가실새 제자와 많은 무리가 동행하더니

sentences.original_text: Soon afterward he went to a town called Nain
and his disciples and a great crowd went with him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 제자들과 큰 무리가 그와 함께 갔습니다
